Other Information.Test Conditions: Aqueous solution under white light irradiation (0.5 W cm^-2, 400–600 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: The mesoporous channels in the MOF nanosheets facilitate O2 diffusion for singlet oxygen generation.

Experimental Validation.Method: Chemical trapping with ADMA and fluorescence imaging using carboxy-H2DCFDA

Other Information.Additional Info: Highly dense assembly of porphyrin ligands with 77 wt% loading; exhibits excellent photodynamic therapy efficacy under light irradiation.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Aqueous solution under white light irradiation (0.5 W cm^-2, 400–600 nm)
Other Information.Additional Info: Nanosheets maintain crystallinity and exhibit efficient singlet oxygen generation.

Experimental Validation.Method: Chemical trapping with ADMA and fluorescence imaging using carboxy-H2DCFDA

Other Information.Additional Info: Exfoliated nanosheets retain crystallinity and demonstrate high dispersibility and biocompatibility; effective for photodynamic therapy.
